- 08 Days

Thousands of customers trusted us to perform their Umrah hajj Bangladesh through our Umrah packages from Bangladesh, hajj and Umrah packages, as we are the best Hajj Umrah travel agents also the best hajj travel agency.

Package Includes

Air ticket with all taxes on Kuwait / Gulf / Air Arabia or other Airlines: Dhaka – Jeddah – Dhaka / Dhaka – Jeddah – Madinah – Dhaka / Dhaka – Madinah – Jeddah – Dhaka (economy class).

3 Nights hotel accommodation in Madinah.

Daily breakfast at hotel (premium package only)

Visa fee with service charge.

Package Excludes

Food not included with package price for Makkah / Madinah (where not specified), but available at hotel or restaurant (approx. SR10/per lunch or dinner and SR5/per breakfast)

Food Menu - Breakfast: Paratha / Ruti, Dall / Eggs / Vegetable, Lunch & Diner: Chicken / Fish, Vegetable / Vorta / Shak, Dall, Plain Rice.

Any kinds of personal cost or others which are not mentioned above.

Remarks

General

Package price applicable for TRAVEL WITH GROUP only.

Package price applicable for TRAVEL WITH GROUP only.

Flight Schedule

For any kind of natural issues for example: if Airlines change the flight schedule before the day of departure then hotel booking will not change as per nonrefundable policy and if Airlines change the flight schedule before the day of return then extra hotel accommodation charge will be added.

For any kind of natural issues like if flight delay or missing luggage by airlines then obokash.com will not responsible for that.

Extra luggage other than mentioned on ticket would be paid by the pilgrim.

Vehicle Status

Vehicle Waiting Time Period: for private transportation's 120 Minutes at Haj Terminal and 15 Minutes at hotel.

Transportation timings / vehicle types can’t be changed unless informed before 24 Hrs, additional charges may apply. All guests must maintain time that mentioned in voucher.

Hotel Policies

Vehicle Waiting Time Period: for private transportation's 120 Minutes at Haj Terminal and 15 Minutes at hotel.

Transportation timings / vehicle types can’t be changed unless informed before 24 Hrs, additional charges may apply. All guests must maintain time that mentioned in voucher.

Moyallem Activities:

Vehicle Waiting Time Period: for private transportation's 120 Minutes at Haj Terminal and 15 Minutes at hotel.

Transportation timings / vehicle types can’t be changed unless informed before 24 Hrs, additional charges may apply. All guests must maintain time that mentioned in voucher.
